text: Meyronnes is a former commune. It is in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in southeast France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Val-d'Oronaye.Arrêté préfectoral 14 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Alpes-de-Haute- Provence
title: Meyronnes
